message:
Empty line should be followed by

tag on the next line.

tag on the next line.

Empty line should be followed by

tag on the next line.
'package' should be separated from previous statement.
Wrong lexicographical order for 'java.util.stream.Stream' import. Should be before 'org.springframework.stereotype.Component'.
'}' at column 7 should be on the same line as the next part of a multi-block statement (one that directly contains multiple blocks: if/else-if/else, do/while or try/catch/finally).
